main event: A farmer found an alleged Flying Saucer instrument near Danforth, Illinois, in August 1947.
interesting points: The object burned an area of 12 feet in diameter around where it landed., The analysis concluded that the specimens were part of a hoax., The examined specimens included fragments made from plaster of Paris and metallic components., The items were determined to have no connection with any recognized military projects or flying saucer phenomena., The report involved investigations conducted by the FBI and Army Air Forces.
